mapper.update: update t_ondemand_shipment set status_cd = '0004', magi_extract_target_flg = '0', upd_pg = 'MagiLinkJob', upd_sys_time = SYSDATE(), upd_count = upd_count + 1, upd_subsidiary_time = UTC_TIMESTAMP(), upd_local_time = LOCALTIME() where 0 = 0 and subsidiary_cd = #{subsidiaryCd} and global_no = #{globalNo} and child_seq = #{childSeq}
